name: Temporal MIDI Quantizer
description: This algorithm is a MIDI quantizer, but not a pitch quantizer – it quantizes the position of notes in time (much like applying quantization to the timing of a MIDI clip in your DAW). Timing can be derived from MIDI clock or from clock pulses on the algorithm’s input bus. It only affects MIDI notes – other MIDI messages are not processed. Because there is no concept of ‘replacing’ or ‘consuming’ MIDI events in the disting NT, you will usually want to use different input and output MIDI channels (e.g., receive MIDI notes from your keyboard on channel 1 and output quantized notes on channel 2), and then have your synth algorithm(s) respond on that channel.
use_cases: Correcting timing inaccuracies from live MIDI input
Aligning MIDI notes to a grid for better rhythmic precision
Processing MIDI clock signals for synchronization purposes
Routing quantized MIDI notes to synth algorithms

parameters.name: Input channel
parameters.description: The MIDI channel on which to receive notes.

parameters.name: Output channel
parameters.description: The MIDI channel on which to send quantized notes.

input_ports.name: MIDI Clock Input (if Sync set to MIDI)
input_ports.description: Input for MIDI clock synchronization when Sync is set to MIDI.

input_ports.name: Clock Input Bus
input_ports.description: Input bus used for clock pulses if Sync is set to Clock.

input_ports.name: Clock input
input_ports.description: The input bus to use for clock if Sync is set to Clock.

output_ports.name: MIDI Breakout Output (if enabled)
output_ports.description: Outputs quantized MIDI notes to the breakout when 'Output to breakout' parameter is enabled.

output_ports.name: Select Bus Output (if enabled)
output_ports.description: Outputs quantized MIDI notes to the Select Bus when 'Output to Select Bus' parameter is enabled.

output_ports.name: USB Output (if enabled)
output_ports.description: Outputs quantized MIDI notes to USB when 'Output to USB' parameter is enabled.

output_ports.name: Internal MIDI Output
output_ports.description: Sends quantized MIDI notes internally to other algorithms when 'Output to internal' parameter is enabled.
